mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_sub (id, sub_set_hash, subscriber_id, `group`, `name`, `tree`, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{subSet}, #{subscriberId}, #{group}, #{name}, #{tree}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT count(msub.id) FROM mm_m_sub msub WHERE msub.sub_set_hash = #{subSet} AND end_time IS NULL

SELECT mext.id, mpub.pub_set_hash, mpub.begin_time, mpub.end_time FROM mm_m_sub msub, mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE mext.id = mpub.ext_id AND mpub.pub_set_hash = msub.sub_set_hash AND mext.name = 'root' AND msub.subscriber_id = #{ownerId} AND msub.id = #{subId} AND msub.end_time IS NULL AND mpub.end_time IS NULL AND mext.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY mext.id
